response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. Considering your interest and the potential this product can bring to your endeavors, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
